trans-unit.source: Drag your audio, video and subtitle file * here
Current caption does not provide enough time to provide half the time for a new caption
The time must be specified in the valid format HH:mm:ss.
The caption end time can't be before the start time.
The start time of the caption overlaps with the previous caption.
The caption end time overlaps with the following caption.
Show or hide subtitles in video
Example text: This is what the subtitles will look like.
The invitation link is no longer valid.
You were invited by participate in a project.
Drag your audio or video file * here
Drag your subtitle file (.vtt or .srt) * here
A transcription file (.vtt or .srt) is required
Are you sure you want to delete this ?
You can add or delete sources. To start the recording you need at least 1 visual and 1 auditive source.
Recording ongoing. Press Stop recording if you want to save or dismiss your recording.

The project and the main file could be uploaded and created! However, a problem has occurred with an additional video. Check in the project details which video could not be uploaded and upload it manually if necessary.
The project has been successfully created, you can now close this dialogue close this dialogue! You will find the project in the project list, but it may still be possibly still being processed.
Download the videos manually and try to create the projects with the files manually.
Metadata and main video Aditional Video
The files are being processed, please wait until all files are ready.
All files are ready. You can now upload the project or download the files locally.
Please wait until all files have been uploaded.
An error occurred during the selection when sharing the screen. Please make sure that your Browser does have the necessary permissions to share the screen.
The project is no longer available under this link. The access link may have been changed or the project may no longer exist.
Addresses that are not linked to an account will be invited to the project via email.
Generate new link, revoke old one
Any person who has this link can join the project registered or anonymously.
Generate new link, revoke old one
You already have a recording? Simply upload it and use it too.
Start your recording directly in the browser, without any additional software. Plus, you have complete control over which audio and video sources you want to use.
Of course, you can also download your files and upload them elsewhere.
Your recording can now be shared with our accessible player. You can simply share the link or embed the player in your website.
After recording, your videos are automatically transcribed and subtitles are created. Using the editor, you can then make the final corrections manually, either alone or together with others.
In addition to improvements in accessibility and user experience, we are currently working on a livestream mode. Stay tuned and feel free to check back regularly.
Melvin is currently still under development. However, you can already test the application now.
Sorry, this page is still under development. Please come back at a later time.
We only use your data in accordance with our privacy policy.
This feature is still under development.
This sitemap lists all pages alphabetically.
